author: Taylor Noakes
description:
One of the architects of the debunked “foreign-funded anti-pipeline protester” controversy is now representing a journalist claiming he was forced to resign from CBC News. Former CBC News host Travis Dhanraj has retained lawyer Kathryn Marshall, noted spokesperson for the Ethical Oil Institute, as his counsel. Dhanraj’s public break with CBC has added fuel to […]

The post Who Is Kathryn Marshall, Lawyer for Ex-CBC Host Claiming Anti-Conservative Bias? appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Who Is Kathryn Marshall, Lawyer for Ex-CBC Host Claiming Anti-Conservative Bias?
